full_summary:
# Tender Announcement


### Solicitation Title

**Third Period EC095-230009 RMCSO Boxed Lunches**

### Solicitation Brief
Public Works and Government Services Canada, Atlantic Region, has released a tender for a Regional Master Standing Offer for the supply and delivery of Boxed Lunches to various government departments in Nova Scotia, New Brunswick, and Newfoundland and Labrador. 

### Solicitation Details

- **Reference Number**: WS3866453681
- **Solicitation Number**: WS3866453681
- **Publication Date**: 05 July 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: 07 November 2023
- **Amendment Date**: Not Applicable
- **Contract Start Date**: 01 April 2023
- **Contract End Date**: 31 March 2024

### Procurement Requirements

Public Works and Government Services Canada requires a supplier to provide a Regional Master Standing Offer for the supply, delivery, and offloading of various quantities of Boxed Lunches on an as-needed basis. 

### Key Requirements

- **Regions of Opportunity**: Nova Scotia, New Brunswick, and Newfoundland and Labrador
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
- **Notice Type**: Standing Offer Request

### Contracting Entity
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec
Canada
K1A 0S5

### Contacts
Andrew MacFarlane (SPAC/PSPC)
andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Additional Information
The Standing Offer shall be an agreement and not a contract, and there is no guarantee that the full or any amount of the Standing Offer will be called up. More than one Standing Offer may be issued for this requirement.

### Reference Links
You can find more information on this Solicitation Brief through the following link: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15607404?extsite=MTU2MDc0MDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
